name: BigchainDB GmbH
goal: BigchainDB allows developers and enterprise to deploy blockchain proof-of-concepts, platforms and applications with a scalable blockchain database. Rather than trying to scale up blockchain technology, BigchainDB starts with a distributed database and then adds blockchain characteristics - decentralized control, immutability and the ability to create and transfer assets.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Communication, Digital economy and society, General and Institutional Affairs, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Copyright
Digital Single Market
Intellectual property Law
European Law
Privacy Policy
